org-name: Bungwe la Albinism la Zambia - AFZ
hero-description: Bungwe la Albinism la Zambia ladzipereka kulimbikitsa ufulu wa anthu okhala ndi albinism, kulimbikitsa chidziwitso, ndikumanga gulu lophatikizana pomwe aliyense akhoza kuchita bwino.
mission-statement: Kulimbikitsa ufulu, ulemu, ndikuphatikizidwa kwa anthu okhala ndi albinism ku Zambia kudzera m'mapulogalamu odziwitsa, kulimbikitsa malamulo, ntchito zothandizira, ndikukweza gulu.
focus-rights-desc: Kulimbikitsa kusintha kwa malamulo ndikuteteza kuti pakhale mwayi wofanana kwa anthu onse okhala ndi albinism.
focus-awareness-desc: Kuphunzitsa magulu za albinism kuti tithane ndi zikhulupiriro zolakwika, malingaliro olakwika, ndikusalana bwino kudzera m'mapulogalamu odziwitsa.
focus-support-desc: Kupereka ntchito zofunikira kuphatikizapo kugawa mankhwala oteteza dzuwa, zovala zoteteza, ndikukonzekera kufikira chithandizo chamankhwala.
focus-education-desc: Kuonetsa kuti ana okhala ndi albinism akupeza maphunziro abwino ndi chithandizo choyenera.
news-1-title: AFZ Yayambitsa Kampeni Yodziwitsa M'dziko Lonse
news-1-excerpt: Kampeni yathu yodziwitsa ikufika kumadera akumidzi kuzungulira Zambia kuthana ndi tsalano ndikukulitsa kumvetsetsa.
news-2-title: Kupambana kwa Malamulo: Njira Zatsopano Zoteteza Zavomerezedwa
news-2-excerpt: Boma lavomereza njira zatsopano zamalamulo zoteteza anthu okhala ndi albinism ku nkhanza nditsalano.
news-3-excerpt: AFZ yakulitsa mapulogalamu othandiza maphunziro kuphatikiza ana 200 owonjezera okhala ndi albinism m'zigawo zonse.
cta-description: Pamodzi, tingapange Zambia pomwe anthu okhala ndi albinism akhala ndi ulemu, kufanana, ndimwayi.
address: AFZ ZAMBIA, LOTI HOUSE, Cairo Road, Room G, 4th Floor, 10101 Lusaka, Zambia (opposite Kwacha House)
copyright: Â© 2024 Bungwe la Albinism la Zambia - AFZ. Ufulu wonse wosungidwa.
awareness-description: Pamodzi, tikuphulitsa bata ndikuthyola malingaliro olakwika za albinism. Kudzera mu maphunziro, kulimbikitsa, ndi chithandizo cha gulu, tikupanga dziko pomwe munthu aliyense okhala ndi albinism akhoza kukhala ndi ulemu, kufanana, ndi chiyembekezo.
awareness-stat-1-desc: Anthu padziko lonse amabadwira ndi albinism
donate-page-description: Chopereka chanu chimathandiza kulimbikitsa ufulu, ulemu, ndikuphatikizidwa kwa anthu okhala ndi albinism ku Zambia. Chopereka chilichonse chimapangitsa kusiyana pakumanga gulu lophatikizana.
impact-desc-sunscreen: Kupatsa mankhwala oteteza dzuwa kwa munthu okhala ndi albinism kwa miyezi 3
impact-desc-workshop: Kulipira maphunziro odziwitsa mu gulu limodzi
impact-desc-education: Kuthandiza zida za maphunziro kwa ana 10 okhala ndi albinism
security-note: ðŸ”’ Chopereka chanu ndi chotetezedwa. Mudzakafalitsidwa ku malo otetezedwa a kulipira.
alternative-volunteer-desc: Lowani mu gulu lathu la opereka ndikuthandiza ndi luso lanu.
alternative-corporate-desc: Gwirizanani nafe pa ntchito za antchito, CSR, ndikupanga zosintha m'mudzi.
alternative-supplies-desc: Perekani mankhwala oteteza dzuwa, zovala zoteteza, zida za maphunziro, kapena zinthu zina zofunikira.
slide-1-desc: AFZ imapereka mankhwala oteteza dzuwa kwa ana okhala ndi albinism ku Zambia konse.
slide-2-desc: Mwana aliyense ayenera kutetezedwa ku dzuwa. AFZ imaona kuti palibe amene asiyidwa.
slide-3-desc: Kugwira ntchito limodzi ndi midzi, boma, ndi ogwirizana kulimbikitsa ufulu wa anthu okhala ndi albinism.
slide-4-desc: Gulu lathu lodzipereka limagwira ntchito mosalekeza kukonzekera ndi kukhazikitsa njira zolimbikitsira.
slide-5-desc: Albinism imachitika mwachilengedwe pazamoyo zonse, kukondwerera kukongola kwa kusiyanasiyana kwa majini.

events.title: Zochitika - Bungwe la Albinism ku Zambia

hero.title: Zochitika ndi Ntchito
hero.subtitle: Lowani nawo ku zochitika zathu za kulimbikitsa, maphunziro, ndi ntchito za m'mudzi ku Zambia konse

no_events.title: Palibe Zochitika Zopezeka
no_events.message: Palibe zochitika zomwe zikufanana ndi zomwe mwasankha.

resources.title: Bokosi la Zinthu - Bungwe la Albinism ku Zambia

hero.title: Bokosi la Zinthu ndi Malo a Maphunziro
hero.subtitle: Pezerani zinthu zophunzitsira, malangizo, ndi zinthu zothandizira gulu la anthu okhala ndi albinism

categories.title: Magulu a Zinthu
categories.educational_desc: Malangizo, mapepala ofotokozera, ndi zinthu zophunzitsira za albinism
categories.medical_desc: Malangizo a chipatala, uphungu wa kusamalira khungu, ndi zinthu za chipatala
categories.legal_desc: Dziwani ufulu wanu, kutetezedwa kwamulamulo, ndi zinthu za kulimbikitsa
categories.support_desc: Chithandizo cha gulu, zinthu za uphungu, ndi malangizo a banja
